title: Attacker can add arbitrary data to the blockchain without paying gas

activities.message:
The simple fix at this point would be to throw an exception in rlpParse if transaction.get(9).getRLPData() != null.

I have not checked the blockchain to see if anyone has exploited this. If anyone has, some additional code will be needed to make sure that any existing beefy transactions can still pass through as valid.
Thanks for finding and reporting this bug. A mitigation has been deployed and the RSK team is working on a definitive fix for this and other similar message parsing issues that were identified.
Hi @ahook ! Thank you very much for your report, we highly appreciate the time you have spent in it. We look forward to hearing more from you!
